For the purposes of this decision, condition no. 4 of planning permission 23/02195/FUL shall be replaced with the following condition: REPLACEMENT CONDITION 4:The development shall achieve a Certificate of Compliance to the relevant Secure by Design Guide(s) or alternatively achieve Crime Prevention Standards. Within one month of completion of the development, the details shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority. The development thereafter shall be fully retained and maintained in accordance with the approved details for the lifetime of the development.Reason: In the interest of creating safer, secure, sustainable communities.

For the purposes of this decision, condition no. 7 of planning permission 23/02195/FUL shall be replaced with the following condition: REPLACEMENT CONDITION 7:Within 1 month of completion of the development, a Verification Report demonstrating that the approved drainage / SuDS measures have been fully implemented shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in writing. This report must include:a. As built drawings of the sustainable drainage systems including level information (if appropriate)b. Photographs of the completed sustainable drainage systemsc. Any relevant certificates from manufacturers/ suppliers of any drainage featuresd. A confirmation statement of the above signed by the site manager (or similar)Reason: To ensure the sustainable management of water, minimise flood risk, minimise discharge of surface water outside of the curtilage of the property and ensure that the drainage system will remain functional throughout the lifetime of the development in accordance with Policy CP28 of the Core Strategy, DMD 61, and Policies SI 12 & SI 13 of the London Plan and the NPPF.
